news.title: The Musical, Magical Number Theorist
news.summary: The search for artistic truth and beauty has led Manjul Bhargava to some of the most profound recent discoveries in number theory, which have helped earn him the Fields Medal.

news.title: Answers on a donut – the Fields medal lecture of Manjul Bhargava
